ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Player wipe on Test
ygData.msgSnippet: ... did you ever read the disclaimer when you started to play on test?  or did you just go there because it was a reasonably uncrowded server?  the purpose of
ygData.messageBody:
At 10:18 AM 6/21/00 -0400, you wrote:
>Nope I'm not goin back to the Test server without my items and levels back.
>Sorry, some of the stuff I got is near impossible to get there. Do you have
>ANY idea how hard it is to get enough folks together to do naggy on test?
>Or to do a hate break?

did you ever read the disclaimer when you started to play on test? or did you just
go there because it was a reasonably uncrowded server? the purpose of a test server
is to test stuff, not to build up a character and items. that is what the live servers are
for.
